name: Primal Care Facial Blend
description:
Our absolutely pure Facial Blend uses grass fed buffalo tallow, organic jojoba oil and South American organic rose hip seed oil, which is known to nourish and beautify facial skin. We scent this long-lasting, highly moisturizing balm with organic and/or wild-crafted essential oils for an effect that is simultaneously calming and uplifting, and never strongly "perfumy". 

This balm creates a moisture barrier to keep skin hydrated and supple all day, and can be used on the lips and around the eyes, as well. It contains no hormones, antibiotics, chemicals or preservatives.

name: Genuine Buffalo Tallow Skin Balm
description: Paleo skin care, grass fed buffalo tallow softened with jojoba oil. Nourishes your skin like no other product. Absorbs quickly and completely leaves no sticky residue. Use on dry cracked skin, lips, callouses or minor burns. Very good for sun or wind burns. Processed to preserve all the fat soluble vitamins and co-factors. Available lightly scented or unscented natural. Please view and order from www.PrimalCare.net

name: Primal Care Skin Balm in 1oz. tin
description:
Primal Care Skin Balm is formulated from grass fed buffalo tallow. The bison are free-ranging and have never been fed grain, antibiotics or hormones. The rendered tallow is a complex substance containing skin nourishing vitamins, anti microbial and anti inflammatory qualities.
The only other ingredient is organic jojoba oil which is derived from a desert shrub. This oil has been traditionally used by the Native People there to promote suppleness and moisture retention in the skin. The bottom line is...Primal Care Skin Balm not only feels good,  but unlike chemical preparations is actually GOOD FOR YOU!
